term.title: micellar mass

item.text: The term usually refers to a neutral micelle and therefore includes an equivalent amount of counter-ions with the surfactant ions.

item.title: counter-ions (in an ion exchanger, in colloid chemistry)
surfactant (in an ion exchanger, in colloid chemistry)

sources.item: PAC, 1972, 31, 577. 'Manual of Symbols and Terminology for Physicochemical Quantities and Units, Appendix II: Definitions, Terminology and Symbols in Colloid and Surface Chemistry' on page 612 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197231040577)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
